message.body: Sooo excited to see you tomorrow!!!! Unfortunately, we're heading back up after dinner, so no sleepover. Matthew thinks dinner will be around 7:30, but I'll keep you posted.
Sooo excited to see you too! 730 is great. I'll miss getting a chance to touch butts with you as we sleep but oh well...
Indian food at 730??
He changed it to Peruvian. I'm trying to find out the name of it now.
Perf
My brother won't get back to me, but sit tight
Roger that
Hahaha
Pollo Inca! It's either in Torrance or Hawthorne.
Cool. I can't tell which location it is when I look online... We also live close to a really good thai place bamboo Thai bistro and know of a cool pizza
place that is in an old warehouse called eatalian. Just throwing those out there too
Oh, cool. ####'s calling the shots tonight. I'll ask him about where it is when he calls in a few mins
Ok that's fine
Ok! He says it's the one on Hawthorne Ave.
Ha both the Torrance one and the lawndale ones are on Hawthorne
How about we go to the Torrance one then? 730?
Ha, of course
Yeah. Yes. We'll take charge!
Torrance location, 7:30. Confirmed.
Haha leave it to the ladies
Freal
Everyone will be late.
I need a drink.
I'm not surprised ha. We're already gonna be there in a few mins. Want me to order you a drink???
Haha thanks, but no. See you eventually!
Sorry!!
No prob. How late? #######??
No idea. We're in Manhattan Beach...prob a combo of #### and ####### + my dad getting lost.
Ok. You're probably like 20-30 mins away. I can feel you annoyance emanating through my phone
Haha I bet! Good thing I'm not starving yet.
Seriously. Godspeed. Let me know if you need help with directions
Thank you!!
